home_description: AI wellness wey dey quantum-private by design. Track fitness, nutrition, and health privately with optional professional support.
landing_description: Wellio na privacy-first Wellness APP Platform for individuals, with optional support from trainers, coaches, and clinicians. Post-quantum secure.
dashboard_description: View your fitness stats, track progress, and stay motivated with your personal dashboard.
auth_description: Join Wellio to track your wellness journey privately and connect with optional professional support.
not_found_description: The page wey you dey find no dey. Go back to Wellio home.
accessibility_description: Our commitment to digital accessibility and WCAG compliance.
cookie_policy_description: Learn how we use cookies and similar technologies.
ccpa_rights_description: Your California privacy rights under the CCPA.
session_management_description: Manage your active sessions and security settings.
security_audit_description: View security events and activity logs for your account.
clinician_dashboard_description: Monitor patient wellness with PHI-free summaries and risk alerts.
for_professionals_description: Grow your coaching or clinical practice with quantum-private wellness intelligence. Functional insights wey no go expose personal data.
